title: #GunReformNow​? Not on Our Watch!
description:
The bodies in Colorado aren’t even cold, and the Left is pushing gun control. We’re not going to let them. Also, Joe Biden’s new “woke” military is making us a ripe target for China. Kamala Harris has a giggling problem. And did Kristi Noem flip-flop on protecting women’s sports?

GET TODAY'S SHOW NOTES with SOURCES: https://www.louderwithcrowder.com/show-notes-ccolorado-gun-reform
